author: Staff Reporter
text:
A laptop and Rs. 45,000 were stolen from a car on Muthamizh Nagar in Pammal on Tuesday.

Police said Giridharan (45), an eatery owner, parked his car in front of his house on Parthasarathi Street, when miscreants damaged its windows and stole the laptop and cash.

Jewellery stolen

Gold jewellery weighing eight sovereigns was stolen from a house at Taramani on Monday.

Dilli (38), a snack seller, had locked his house on Erikkarai Street and left for work. When he returned in the evening, he found the door broken open and the jewels missing. — Staff Reporter
title: Laptop, cash stolen from car
